description: This file is a C header (.h) file containing function prototypes and API declarations for the Transport Layer Security (TLS) Connection Controller (Cco) component, including creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization functions.

methods.name: TlsCreateConnController
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new TLS Connection Controller object with specified container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: TlsCcoCreate
methods.description: Creates a new instance of the TLS Connection Controller.

methods.name: TlsCcoRemove
methods.description: Removes and frees resources associated with a TLS Connection Controller object.

methods.name: TlsCcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls the necessary objects or components into the TLS Connection Controller.

methods.name: TlsCcoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the TLS Connection Controller object to a default or specified state.
